statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m | \033[34m%s\033[0m" "$model" "$(basename "$current_dir")"; if [ -d "$current_dir/.git" ]; then cd "$current_dir" && branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null) && [ -n "$branch" ] && printf " \033[90m%s\033[0m" "$branch" && (git diff --quiet && git diff --cached --quiet || printf "\033[90m*\033[0m"); fi; [ "$style" != "default" ] && printf " | \033[33m%s\033[0m" "$style"; echo
